subject: [Radiance-general] HDRI mailing list availabl
body:
Hi folks,

Following the recent interest in HDR, Greg and others have asked for an
extra list -
which is now available for subscription at

http://www.radiance-online.org/mailman/listinfo/hdri

-Peter

--
pab-opto, Freiburg, Germany, http://www.pab-opto.de
[see web page to check digital email signature]
